actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to increase the minimum established prices used to calculate deficiency payments for the 1991 through 1995 crops of wheat and feed grains, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949, as amended by the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990, to increase minimum wheat and feed grain established prices for deficiency payment purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to increase the minimum established prices used to calculate deficiency payments for the 1991 through 1995 crops of wheat and feed grains, and for other purposes.
